articles.title: YouTube to test AI-powered age verification system for US users
articles.summary: YouTube on Wednesday will begin testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. that relies on artificial intelligence to differentiate between adults and minors, based on the kinds of videos that they have been watching.
articles.translated_title: YouTube to test AI-powered age verification system for US users
articles.translated_summary: YouTube on Wednesday will begin testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. that relies on artificial intelligence to differentiate between adults and minors, based on the kinds of videos that they have been watching.

articles.title: AI Powers Green-Tech Surge
articles.summary: Green firms in the US have found something of a lifeline in artificial intelligence after being bogged down by high interest rates, shrinking funding and, more recently, President Donald Trump’s sharp rollback of support. Clean technology companies that have inked deals to support data centers have seen their stocks soar this year, outperforming the S&P 500.. Even as some clean energy firms struggle to convince investors that they can thrive during Trump’s second term, the AI-driven surge in electric demand — the most in decades — is providing clear tailwinds for others.  KR Sridhar, Bloom Energy, founder and CEO tells Bloomberg Businessweek Daily says AI will drive the need for energy, including fuel cells. (Source: Bloomberg)

articles.title: Illinois bans AI therapy as some states begin to scrutinize chatbots
articles.summary: Illinois banned therapists from using artificial intelligence to treat patients, joining a small group of states regulating the use of AI chatbots for mental health.
articles.translated_title: Illinois bans AI therapy as some states begin to scrutinize chatbots

articles.title: NY's free community college program for adult students drawing upwards of 16,000 applicants
articles.summary: More than 16,500 have applied to the free NY community college program for adult students interested in high-demand fields like artificial intelligence and nursing.
articles.translated_title: NY's free community college program for adult students drawing upwards of 16,000 applicants

articles.title: India’s First AI Unicorn Fractal Files for $560 Million IPO
articles.summary: Fractal Analytics, a provider of artificial intelligence and analytics services, filed for an initial public offering in Mumbai that could value the company at more than $3.5 billion.
articles.translated_title: India’s First AI Unicorn Fractal Files for $560 Million IPO
articles.translated_summary: Fractal Analytics, a provider of artificial intelligence and analytics services, filed for an initial public offering in Mumbai that could value the company at more than $3.5 billion.

articles.title: Study: AI programs might help ER overcrowding in hospitals
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence programs can help doctors and nurses predict hours earlier which ER patients will likely require hospital admission, a new study says.
articles.translated_title: Study: AI programs might help ER overcrowding in hospitals
articles.translated_summary: Artificial intelligence programs can help doctors and nurses predict hours earlier which ER patients will likely require hospital admission, a new study says.

articles.title: YouTube testing a new age verification system in the U.S.
articles.summary: YouTube is ready to start testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. using artificial intelligence to distinguish between adults and minors based on their viewing habits.
articles.translated_title: YouTube testing a new age verification system in the U.S.
articles.translated_summary: YouTube is ready to start testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. using artificial intelligence to distinguish between adults and minors based on their viewing habits.

articles.title: AI search firm Perplexity makes $34.5 billion surprise bid for Google Chrome
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence search company Perplexity has made an unsolicited, $34.5 billion offer to purchase Google’s Chrome browser, a surprise move by a Google Search challenger that’s looking to upend how people find information online.
articles.translated_title: AI search firm Perplexity makes $34.5 billion surprise bid for Google Chrome
